summary.name: bioconductor-fourcseq
summary.description: FourCSeq is an R package dedicated to the analysis of (multiplexed) 4Csequencing data. The package provides a pipeline to detect specific interactionsbetween DNA elements and identify differential interactions between conditions.The statistical analysis in R starts with individual bam files for each sampleas inputs. To obtain these files, the package contains a python script (extdata/python/demultiplex.py)to demultiplex libraries and trim off primer sequences. With a standard alignmentsoftware the required bam files can be then be generated.
